page_content:
VMware International Limited

VMware vCloud® Air™ Virtual Private Cloud

vCloud Air is a hybrid cloud platform built on vSphere that enables organisations to extend enterprise workloads into a virtual private or dedicated cloud with ease. It provides compute, networking and storage resources which are compatible with your existing on-premises infrastructure as well as current IT skills and experience.

Features

  • vCloud Air is an Infrastructure as a Service offering
  • UK based datacenter managed by VMware
  • Dedicated cloud: single tenant private cloud with physically isolated compute
  • VPC: multi-tenant private cloud with logically isolated compute
  • Seamless extension of on-premises infrastructure to the cloud
  • Bring your own licences to Dedicated cloud
  • High availability and load balancing included at no cost
  • Firewalls, VPNs, load-balancing, Disk I/O, HA, DHCP/Nat all included
  • Built in redundant VMs and auto-restarting at no extra cost
  • Connectivity options: Direct Connect, vCloud Connector, and Offline Data Transfer

Benefits

  • Place workloads on premises, off premises, or both
  • Choose where your apps live and have full management control
  • Reduce Capex spend and increase agility through faster service delivery
  • Increase efficiency by optimising existing IT utilisation
  • Scalable test and development, freeing up resources for production services
  • Use same management tools for onsite and offsite cloud environments
  • Networks can be set to mimic existing data centre settings
  • Assured security and compliance, with known data location and sovereignty
  • Leverage the same tools, skill sets, and processes as vSphere
  • 10. Production-level support and SLAs backed by VMware

Pricing

£712 per unit per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Month
  • Trial option available
